please_select_time_period: Please select time period of interest:
name: Name
full_extent_note: * Please note that data plotting for the full extent might take a large amount of time
page_info_text: This page contains interactive plots of real-time and/or historical time series data available for a selected station.
interactive_zoom: Interactive Zoom: Click-drag vertically or horizontally in the plot to zoom in.
interactive_legend: Interactive Legend: Hover over the curve to display values
metadata_info: For each time series, metadata are shown on the left of the plot.
metadata_section_info: Under the metadata section, any available time period of interest can be selected and visualized. Also, data for the selected time period can be downloaded in NetCDF-CF, WaterML (1.0 or 2.0) formats.
